website_summaries.verdict: A 10 gallon kit that really comes with everything you need to set up your aquarium.
pros: Includes a thermometer for monitoring water temperature
cons: The lights on this set have a tendency to not last a long time and need replacement

customer_reviews.title: Two tanks-both broke in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought two tanks at once. After 2 months the first sprung a leak and poured 9 gallons all over my floor. In a NYC apt this is a nightmare scenario. Now a month later the second tank did the same thing! I’ve had MANY tanks in past without a problem. This is incredibly frustrating and clearly a poor product. Certainly I understand the positive reviews. The tank did go together easy and look great until it failed to do the one thing it was meant to = hold water!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The filter is great, the heater keeps my bettas happy at 78C
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tank. The filter is great, the heater keeps my bettas happy at 78C. Of course, with any new tank (ordered online or bought in store) a risk for leaks is present. Aqueon is a good brand but things happen. Fill your tank halfway, check for leaks. Fill it up and check each day for two days. In this hobby, there is always risk. I upgraded the lid to the Aqueon Glass lid (fits perfect!) and Nicrew lights. Looks much better now! You can’t go wrong :) My betta girls love this tank.
customer_reviews.author: crly_wsjhn

customer_reviews.title: Good tank but the filter sucked up a neon tetra and it died
customer_reviews.text: I have several fish in this tank and it seems well made and the light/filter work well. The only complaint I have is that the water-intake part of the filter which has holes in it that are wide enough that one of my tetras got sucked in and died. This isn't the fault of the tank or filter which is why it didn't impact my rating but it is good to know if you are looking into this for neon tetras or a similarly small fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, supreme viewing, whisper quiet
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium is excellent. Its ULTRA quiet and the lights are brilliant white but somehow soft at the same time. It's ideal for my preschool classroom and other teachers who've admired it have now purchased their own. Go for it, this is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The tank itself is nice and the filter is reasonable but the heater is ...
customer_reviews.text: The tank itself is nice and the filter is reasonable but the heater is trash and you'll want a new one and my lights died after a month as they are very exposed to water so I need to buy an entirely new lid and light for it today only a few days past my month of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This fish tank is the answer to someone who wants everything in one box ready to go. It arrives well packaged and easy to set up. My daughters and I had this set up in less than thirty minutes. Including adding the water. You have a thermometer, filter, food, aqua safe, filter, tank, and lid. Super easy. We added gravel and let the water sit for a week before adding our fish. We have had no problems and love our easy to use tank. We added four fish total and have had no issues. We rinse the filter once a week and change it monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet tank as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: This fish tank is amazingly quiet compared to the last one we owned, we are really happy.
customer_reviews.author: VIP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for everything... This is a full set up...was shipped securely. Impressive Packaging. However you need to be ok reading directions the filter and the heater and the set up and cleaning procedures are DETAILED. Overall Im very satisified with this purchase. cover the end of filter tube with pantyhose to prevent fin damage...
customer_reviews.author: Zohar

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Works great! LED light is very bright, tank warmer work's well. Filter is very quiet, but the stick on thermometer isn't easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this kit.
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to grab the last “used- like new” available kit through amazon and I’m glad I took the leap. I bought it for the purpose of making it my quarantine tank because despite owning two empty ten gallons I found that the accessories a lone were going to cost as much as a new kit, then I got this for $20 less. So now I have 3 tens. Win-win. I won’t deny that the lack of hinges is a bit weird but not weird enough for me to take off a star. Taking the hood off safely isn’t complex and I’m interested to see if the led filter warning works. And yes, those are jail cells.
customer_reviews.author: Free_Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Traumatized my children
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was being a good mom by getting my kids a fish tank. This was stylish looking, nice size, good price. We got 5 guppies- Caviar, Oyster, Sip of Sunshine, Glenn, and Grandpa Joe. Went to bed. The next day, there was only one guppy in the tank- Grandpa Joe. Of course we assumed he went on a murderous rampage and ate his brethren. Nope. Later in the day Grandpa Joe had disappeared. An inspection of the filter gave up 4 of the 5 bodies. We still don't know where the fifth one is. We gave them a simple but elegant funeral. Avoid this aquarium kit. Or if you get it, throw out the filter.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserFromTheBeginning

customer_reviews.title: Complete Package!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank so much I am getting a second! Filter: It’s great because it has a really good filter. I recommend buying the ammonia pad for keeping it extra clean and fighting the ammonia battle in the beginning which is so difficult to deal with. LED Lights: The light is nice. It’s bright, I know it’s a good light because my plants are healthy. Lid: Low profile, has a flip lid on top which I LOVE. Tank size: I have two African Dwarf Frogs, 3 mystery snails and a koi. Overall: I would recommend. If you’re a beginner, you will appreciate it. It’s a full complete set. Comes with food and water conditioner (but definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Kitakat

customer_reviews.title: Loud filter.
customer_reviews.text: The filter makes such an ungodly grinding noise that you have to yell over it.
customer_reviews.author: KRooRoo

customer_reviews.title: Eh not so much
customer_reviews.text: Pissed! Had for exactly 3 months started gushing water all over my wood cabinet & floor! Eh. Not the quality I expected for $75. 1st off The glue is sloppy & peeling. The lid is flimsy. My fish are now residing in a bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’ve had this tank kit for a bit I can leave a review. This is an excellent kit for beginners. I keep 2 African Dwarf frogs in it and it’s perfect for them. The tank has a light that flashes when the filter needs changing. The heater works great, no fuss. The lights are bright. It was extremely easy to set it up. The only extras you need to buy are your decor. My frogs are happy.
customer_reviews.author: KarenS

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The tank holds water. The filter works but is not all that quiet. It has replaceable cartridges, which are easy in and out. I'll be getting an aqua clear filter. The heater doesn't keep the water at 78 or even 68 degrees. I'm guessing it's undersized for the aquarium. The light goes on but nothing happens. I'm getting a second heater. The hood has to be completely removed to do any aquarium maintenance. The light under the hood is bright but if you want to raise plants you'll need to get a light for plants. I should have just bought the tank and other items separately.
customer_reviews.author: fishface

customer_reviews.title: All inclusive aquarium kit - Quality concern
customer_reviews.text: First kit arrived with cracked glass. Amazon return and replace process simple and is reason for the extra star. Second kit arrived without breakage but I was immediately concerned with quality of tank seal. The silicon was poorly applied (messy, uneven) and did not inspire confidence that it would retain water for the long haul. With other reviewers stating aquarium held water for the short term, but then leaked, I decided to return 2nd kit and look at other products. Its a good price for a kit. Includes what is needed to start. And, perhaps with luck of the draw many end up receiving a tank with a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Really great bundle
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about purchasing an aquarium online, but this one arrived in perfect condition! The filter, heater, and hood all work exactly as advertised. The hood is a little disappointing because it’s so closed off, but I blame myself for not looking at it more closely (see photo). Considering everything that comes with this kit, I’d say it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Percy little kit for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my shrimp breeding tank. I didn’t want anything crazy as I have 7 tanks. But this does a perfect job of housing my shrimp and plants. The fact it comes with a heater is awesome! The filter is quiet, easy to maintain and the tank remains well filtered. The led hood and lights are obviously not high end- but do a perfect job for low light plants and keeping a nice ambiance in the aquarium. The glass seems a little better quality than some other 10 gal that I’ve had. Plus the silicone isn’t smeared all over the place either. Definitely a nice little kit for any beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE HEATER!! IT COOKED MY FISH!!
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of seeming to work fine, I just went to feed my fish before work and all 7 had literally been cooked overnight. The water was optimum level and nothing had changed from yesterday to this morning. The heater clearly malfunctioned and killed all my fish. PLEASE DO NOT USE IT!! THROW IT AWAY UPON RECEIVING THE TANK KIT!! The tank and filter seem to be fine though, so I gave it three stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for a cheap kit
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the seams look like they may have been done by a kindergartner but the tank holds water which is the important thing. The filter is not very loud as far as inexpensive filters go and it works really well. Give the heater some time, I thought mine wasn't working but it just took a little extra time to kick on and it's now holding my tank steady at 78 degrees. All in all not bad for an inexpensive set up and my aquatic friends seem happy.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the is kit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the is kit for the money. It comes with a filter, a heater, a lid with LED lights, a net, water conditioner and small bottle of food. Most kits don't include a heater so that is a plus. I bought the limit of 3 and every single one of them made it to my house with no damage. Great package design. The lid design is a vast improvement over what used to come with kits like this. Even has a little flap to feed or add medication.
customer_reviews.author: Earth2Frog

customer_reviews.title: Very nice starter tank!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Nice! Came with a 50W heater, but a 10 gallon needs a 100W heater. I bought another heater. 50W is for a 5 gallon tank. Please put yhe correct wattage heater in this package.
customer_reviews.author: Silky Lady biker

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is satisfactory. However, the caulking on the seams looks very elementary and lacks any professionalism. I was actually concerned at first from the appearance that it might not even hold water (which it does)!! Furthermore, there is a large gap between the good and filter, so do not purchase if you have any creature known for escaping or jumping from tanks. Also if you expected a quiet filter, you would be disappointed. While I’ve certainly heard worse, it is also certainly not quiet by any definition of the word. Lastly, my tank did not come with the thermometer like it mentions, it only came with the heater, filter, net and samples.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Tank
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and with no damage. I was a little surprised with the amount of sealant on the glass at the joints but it does not cause a distraction once the tank is filled with water and decorations. The included heater is causing us a little concern because it doesn't seem to be working properly so we'll contact the manufacturer regarding the warranty but other than that this is a great little 10 gallon tank to start your new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Best tank ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent tank for beginners! The tank comes with water heater, water filter and one cartridge, lighted hood a fish net, water conditioner and detailed instructions on how to set it up. Very simple set up with everything included...except the fish! 🐟 My fish were so happy to be upgraded from their 2.5 gallon tank! I would suggest buying additional filter cartridges as you will need them anyway. But, it does come with one filter cartridge for the filter. So, that will give you some time before it needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Erica LaChappelle

customer_reviews.title: The filter is broken
customer_reviews.text: My filter doesn’t work and my fish are dying while the tank is filthy... I have to go and buy a new filter and a suplimentary tank for my remaining fish to survive while I clean this out **update** all five fish are now dead and now the filters doesn’t even pull water through at all and just makes a loud buzzing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Stafford Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed to get started
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and undamaged, set up was easy and clear with the 3 instruction booklets that some with it (for the tank, heater, and filter). Make sure you don't set it up too close to the wall, it needs about a 2" gap behind it for the filter. Comes with tropical fish food flakes and a Quick Start chem, but I'm still letting mine cycle for a while before adding fish. I used about 10 lbs of substrate to create a 3/4" layer across the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Manusia

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tank!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Super fast shipping and it arrived without any kind of damage. LED lights are very bright, filter is quiet and the lid stays put. Can't ask for much more. Great starter set- comes with fish food, water conditioner, net, heater and filter.
customer_reviews.author: KERI B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my one goldfish with decoration
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my one goldfish with decoration. Filter works fine. Light is strong. Lid doesn't fit quite right on top of the tank. But no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Stirling

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The filter quit working after a few months and I had to get a new one. I bought this tank in August of 2018. It's May 2019 and I noticed today that it has sprung a leak. Didn't even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: JennyJMa

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome purchase for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Storing hermit crabs. Recessed in bottom so I can attach the heater and not set the book shelf on fire. Came with a fish starter kit too. I was able to swap out the lid with a breathable one that was fit to standard size. It felt sturdy but was light enough for a small female woman to move. Very happy with it. Great buy and it was packaged very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I have ever gotten on amazon.. the tank and heater came broken. The thermometer was missing, and the red light to alert when the filter doesnt work...I have never been so disappointed.. not to mention the delivery was late...
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Just right size for me
customer_reviews.text: My son wanter to start a fishtank. I have always found them relaxing, so I started one too. This tank is perfect for me. Not too big, not too small. Great for a beginner like me. Love the LED lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tank. Simple set up.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this tank. Set up was easy (I have other tank so it's getting easier for set up) even for beginners it should be easy. My fish will be going in tomorrow (they are in a separate tank right now) and hopefully it holds up. Will review again in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Heather solano

customer_reviews.title: Nice aquarium
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the aquarium except for one feature on it. Most aquariums I've seen have a nice sized portion of the top that opens up to feed the fish but this one just has a tiny opening and we don't like that but we can live with it. We often just lift the whole lid which is inconvenient, especially for our son who most times feeds the fish. But there hasn't been anything defective on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. No missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine tank that came with a nice quiet filter and a full hood. Didn't leak, everything fits. The only thing I don't like is the led lights. They are as bright as landing lights on an airplane. I'm not landing an airplane, and I certainly don't want to blind my fish. Crazy amount of lumens! I don't get it. Sure, your tank will look great from the excessive lighting, but in a month when your fish is bumping into walls you'll know why. To the company: Please cut the output of your lighting in this set by 3/4 power.
customer_reviews.author: Laugh@Libs

customer_reviews.title: Best tank ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank it came with everything i need. So far i have 3 of them. The heater isnt all that great so i sugguest buying one. Hlwever the tank is lovely and the lights on the lid is literally 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice set up but would be nice if the top would lift up on hinges so you didn't have to move it completely to get inside the tank. Overall good choice. Not sure about the filter might have to get a better one and the thermometer is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie  Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 10 GALLON ONLY 8 GALLON
customer_reviews.text: Don't get taken like i did! This is only a 8 gallon that i just paid $80 for! I am pissed
customer_reviews.author: ShopAHoliC

customer_reviews.title: Loud like not a ninja.
customer_reviews.text: Its hmmmmmmmm loud. So hmmmmm very hmmmmmmm very hmmmmmmm loud. Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmnnnnnn.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Gwaltney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first aquarium!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it for a beginner. Great price, easy instructions/setup! Holds one beta, four tetra’s & two catfish type fish with ZERO fighting! They all get along peacefully! 👍😁
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P

customer_reviews.title: Good aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Fantastoc starter kit. Having owned many aquariums in the past, this one is high quality. The filter made a lot of noise at first but it got quieter as it went on. This kit comes with everything you need to start your bio table before you add fish. Comes with food and water treatment. Lights are nice and bright too!
customer_reviews.author: HiveTyrant36

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Fish Tank, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Set my tank up today! My goldfish outgrew his tank so I decided to get him this one. The LED lights are super bright and pretty. It came as expected and arrived quickly. It came with fish food, a net, and some $2 off coupons for more fish food and water conditioner. The pump has a little whirring sound, but that could be how I have it sitting on my desk. Overall, I’m super excited to put my fish in it and would definitely recommend. No complaints yet!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Tank
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to upgrade to a bigger tank without a lot of expense. This came with the lights and heater so no added costs. The fish seem happy. The only problem is that we keep getting this green algae all over the glass and plants and rocks. We were cleaning the tank everyday but it just keeps coming back. Finally bought a film for the back of the tank because we think it was getting too much light and it seems better. Overall, a great fish tank for 4 fish and 3 plants.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Came with pretty much everything I needed, seems study and my fish is definitely enjoying the extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bad filter, tank leaked after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My son used bday money to get his first aquarium. The first fish died after a week or so. Turns out the pump wasn’t working right. Bought a new pump and After less than 2 months the tank started leaking!!!!! I can’t return it because it’s past the 30day window. Aren’t aquariums supposed to last more than 2 months?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Greninger

customer_reviews.title: Filter does not work after 2 months. fishes died!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this aquarium for our glofishes. Things seemed okay at first but the filter stopped working after 2 months. We changed cartridges every 4 weeks and ammonia reducer every 2 weeks but nothing helped. Dirt started accumulating even though we changed 50% of water every 2 weeks. 2 of our fishes are dead now and this filter is to blame. This product is an utter disappointment. The least Amazon or the seller can do is send us a replacement filter but I don't see any way of contacting them as the product is way past return time.
customer_reviews.author: Umme Hani

customer_reviews.title: Both filter and heater were DOA.
customer_reviews.text: The heater did not work out of the box and had to be replaced. The filter was also DOA and had to be replaced. No quality control. The shipping box had no damage and the aquarium was fine.
customer_reviews.author: hurbert

customer_reviews.title: Filter pump is very loud & doesn't work well!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for all-in deal.. But filter pump is very loud, and my water is already cloudy with it working on day 2. Looks like I'll be buying a new filter pump. Hope this saves you some time!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson K

customer_reviews.title: Normal tank with sleek accessories.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the filter and setuo, but other than that, it's a fish tank. Nothing else special about it. It doesn't leak and there is plenty of space for my fish. The small hole for feeding is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive deal
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive tank. Hood would be better if the hanging filter could be placed to the side instead of the center. Has slots for tubes and wires which are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Reeser

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I had a great experience with this company. I purchased the tank in May and was very satisfied with it. In August, the lights on the hood stopped working. I emailed them and got a quick reply. They sent a new hood in a matter of days. I'm happy that they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Very easy to set up and it looks great. Some people said filter was loud. I can’t hear mine unless I'm right next to it ( I thought it was broke ) but works great!! I’ll update if something goes bad but so far better than I expected 😀
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Needed to buy a 2nd filter
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter package but the filter unit included wasn't enough and we bought a 2nd bubbler filter in order to keep the water clear enough and keep it from smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyne Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Tanks good, would replace filter.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tank for almost 2 months now and there has been no problems so far. My betta fish loves this tank. I like how the lid is removable so a different top can easily be added. The filter is fine but I don’t like the heater. The heater is preset so I replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Filter sucks, everything else is ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent tank, no leakage. Lights are good. Included filter is crap. Something about the glad makes the clear water look green when the lights are off. Ain't a background can lessen the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kiralee

customer_reviews.title: I just don't trust it for long time use
customer_reviews.text: The only things I'm still using is the hood and the heater, I replaced the tank and the filter, both were no good, there are 2 cracks in the tank and I just don't trust it for long time use. That was a waste of a gift card..
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: A traditional 10 gallon fish tank.
customer_reviews.text: This 10 gallon fish tank comes with everything you need. Tank, filter, heater & LED lid. It's a great value for the money. My fish love it Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C White

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Fish Tank for quite a while now and I have not had any problems at all. All the basics are included in the kit and everything is easy to use and to "assemble".
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, especially at this pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, especially at this pricepoint. I bought the 10 gallon version to use as a shrimp tank, and i couldn't be happier. Everything arrived intact, and set-up was an absolute breeze.
customer_reviews.author: erik meck

customer_reviews.title: Great for first timers
customer_reviews.text: This is our first time owning fish and we really love this aquarium. We have one Betta fish and two snails and it’s pretty convenient. It’s easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: SueZanne

customer_reviews.title: Too many accessories failed in aqueon 10 starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 aqueon 10 gallon starter aquariums from amazon. Within a year 2 of the aqueon quiet filters failed and 2 led lights failed in hood. I had to replace the filters and hood. Bought nicrew led lights and glass cover. That has worked out so far. Cant recommend starter kit. Buy tank separately. Petco dollar gallon sale and by the rest of starter kit individually.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the set up kit. Had all you needed with exception of some decorative pieces. I added fish within 48 hours of filtering. Keeps temp level and food provided in the beginners kit.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Girgis

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for starter tank.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it, but now went bigger. Still use this smaller tank when we need to isolate.
customer_reviews.author: SalF

customer_reviews.title: great tank
customer_reviews.text: the tank came in great condition and it is super big. My betta loves it and even though I read some reviews saying they don't recommend this tank for a betta, I do and it is worth the price. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is included- Except thermometer not working.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful-all included and clear instructions as I haven’t had an aquarium for many years, all is wonderful except thermometer not working.My betta loves it and the Quiet filter!
customer_reviews.author: Happy great-granny!!

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with care!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kids love it also shipped with care packed very good fast shipping super deal thanks Amazon😇😳
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tank, or breeder
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this tank, is the filter is not strong enough!
customer_reviews.author: Trenaway

customer_reviews.title: decent tank, pump and heater not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: As with most of the kits out there, pump that comes with it and the heater are only adequate at best. Heater is also non-adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Ready for fish
customer_reviews.text: The no frustration packaging is awesome! Everything arrived in good shape and ready to go. I like the thinner plastic lid. It makes water changes easier than the old glass tops.. I have two 10 gallon and one 20 gallon tanks by Aqueon.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy if your new like me
customer_reviews.text: I really love my tank, it comes with almost everything that you need if you’re new like me on this, my betta fish is happy on his new place, and I would give this guys 10 stars if I could!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Leaky aquarium, terrible glue job
customer_reviews.text: Aquarium arrived, put water in tank and it started leaking. The gluing was messy and very unprofessional. Disappointed because I need to move several fish to a larger tank asap.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Mystere

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the tank due to it leaking 🤬 almost 2 gallons of water on my desk at work. Glad I was there or it would have been worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal for New Setup
customer_reviews.text: All you need to start a new tank. Everything looks and works well except for stick-on thermometer which is very hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: GFenster

customer_reviews.title: filter & heater are trash
customer_reviews.text: We set up the entire tank on a Sunday evening, added 1 fish on Monday evening & by Thursday evening the filter indicator light is already blinking that it needs changed. We followed the directions step by step - no reason the filter should need replaced in 4 days! Thermometer strip does not work. Heater had the tank at 80 degrees, so shut it off. All we have left is a tank that we could have bought for $20 anywhere. NOT A BARGAIN when nothing works!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: This tank is awesome! Comes with everything you need. One thing I learned is that you need to set up your whole tank (water, rocks, plants, etc) and let it run for a whole week before adding fish!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Ernst

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TANK !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this tank set and the tank is leaking all over the place and now I have to buy another tank to replace this horrible tank. I am very upset and frustrated. Do not buy this tank unless you like disasters.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Product Function
customer_reviews.text: I was upset that my first fish tank wasn't assembled properly. As soon as I received it poured the water in and it leaked all over my carpet. Thanks to Amazon I got a replacement immediately 👍 which worked out great. I'm happy with Amazon's customer service and loyalty. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vieyra

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tank and the filter has been fantastic so far. I feel like the questions about style and presentation don't apply as it's a rectangular glass tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great tank, keeps clean and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Everything promised was there. Perfect tank for apartments or as a starter tank. Looked so nice we would be mesmerized just watching the fish. The filter works great, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking immediately
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even finish filling it before it started leaking. Completely defeats the purpose of a fish tank. Someone reading this, send me a tube of caulk so I can fix your terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this fish tank, built sturdy and design is awesome. The pump and filter really keeps the tank clean for longer period of time
customer_reviews.author: Houston Y

customer_reviews.title: Good not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a year now. It has worked out well and has been easy to maintain. My only complaint is that the cover has been problematic with the light being intermittent (wire near the switch) and the opening flap is a bit small. Overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: dszmauz

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, loud filter
customer_reviews.text: Great tank, the filter is a little loud compared to my other tanks but that us a minor issue. Don't hesitate to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Timprat

customer_reviews.title: nice tank but lights dont last long
customer_reviews.text: the LED lights went out within 2 weeks of filling the tank. I only keep the lights on for about 8 hrs a day and they already went out and It doesn't look like you can buy replacement bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around tank
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are needing a cheap quarantine tank or beginner tank, this is a great choice. It comes with most everything you need to get started and is easy to set up. Can't ask for too much more from it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tank for my betta. Just add decor and substrate and everything else you need is included in this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Okay product with loud filter
customer_reviews.text: The tank is nice and the comments about the sealant is true. I gave it four stars because of the filter. 48 hrs of purchasing the aquarium, the filter has gone from very quite to very loud... I’m hoping the filter doesn’t die out.
customer_reviews.author: Renan Pazzini

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and this tank stays so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: High quality product, great value for my money!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, great value for my money! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: UniGlow Products LLC.

customer_reviews.title: Sent quick and safley packed.....
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything except gravel and fish to get started......great buy. So one month with my tank and the light no longer works......not to happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: My fish is very happy with this tank
customer_reviews.text: This fish tank is easy to maintain and my fish is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Holst

customer_reviews.title: Good LED — noisy HOB
customer_reviews.text: Good tank. Came well packaged. Has held up for the last several months. Filter can be a bit noisy if it doesn’t balance right over the tank (it’ll rattle and make a whirring noise). LED is perfect for the plants I have in with my fish/shrimp, bright but doesn’t seem to scorch my floating plants
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my needs. I have 10 different versions species of fish and frogs
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy glue everywhere
customer_reviews.text: There is glue everywhere. Very sloppy. Displeased. Do not buy. You can get much better product at local pet store for same price!
customer_reviews.author: 50&fab

customer_reviews.title: Filter Killed my Son's Crayfish!!
customer_reviews.text: See title...Due to a faulty filter cover, the pump sucked up my son's blue crayfish during the night and pulled the poor guy into shreds that were dispersed across the whole tank. Very traumatic experience for my responsible little pet owner to go through, so be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Binder

customer_reviews.title: Filter too strong
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this tank for your betta fish the filter is going to be way to strong!! There is no way to adjust the current in the filter either. I’m also having troubles with the heater randomly turning off and on. I suggest getting your own heater and filter, I personally am using a different filter.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: The tank itself is very nice and went together very easily
customer_reviews.text: The tank itself is very nice and went together very easily. The heater, filters, and airpump were easy to install and use. The reason for the three stars is because after having it just one month, one set of the led lights have gone out already. Will need to either figure out how to replace the bulbs or buy a new lid. Other than that disappointment, the tank works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, filter needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Tank is good, but I hope the water filter was more powerful, it does not filter much. I would suggest manufacturers to increase the capacity of water filter.
customer_reviews.author: Anil

product_meta.title: Aqueon Aquarium Starter Kit with LED Lighting 10
product_meta.description: Aqueon LED boxed fish tank kits offer a complete habitat with vibrant LED lighting to bring the aquarium to life. The energy saving low-profile hood features cool white LEDs for total illumination, a convenient feeding door in the front and breakout sections in the back for popular accessories. Complete with high-quality components needed for a healthy aquatic environment including a heater, QuietFlow LED PRO power filter, fish food, water conditioner, fish net and a stick-on thermometer. A complete guide is also included to walk you through the process of proper aquarium setup. The Aqueon QuietFlow LED PRO filter will make maintenance super easy. It’s patent pending LED on the top of the filter will start flashing when it's time to change the cartridge - no more guessing! In addition, the enhanced five-stage filtration and included ammonia specialty filter pad will help keep your aquarium water clean and your fish healthy. Aquarium is made in the USA and measures 20-1/4" x 10-1/2" x 12-9/16". Fish, gravel and décor are sold separately.
feature_bullets: Low profile full hood contains vibrant cool white LED lighting to bring your aquatic environment to life
QuietFlow 10 LED PRO power filter has a red LED light that flashes to indicate when it’s time to change the cartridge – no more guessing!
Preset heater will keep your aquarium temperature at a constant 78 degrees, appropriate for most tropical fish

Complete aquarium kit includes: 10 gallon glass aquarium, low profile LED full hood, QuietFlow 10 LED PRO power filter with medium cartridge, 50W preset heater, premium fish food, water conditioner, fish net, stick-on thermometer

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
